overview: Near 140 birds filmed all over the Continent in their natural habitats, with their song or call .and/or the ambient sound. A narration about their features or behavior, 10 years of filming.  for phone or desktop.
tagline: Ratites (Gigantic birds), waterfowl, pigeons and doves, birds of prey, shore birds, night birds, kingfishers, parrots and cockatoos, ducks and geese.
title: Australian Big Birds
